pages.text: The $(item)Druid Band$() is a powerful trinket of the Earth.$(br)When worn, it will increase your movement speed and regeneration, as long as you walk on natural soil such as $(item)Grass$().$(br)When active, the Druid Band consumes $(marked)ME$().
$(o)The Druid Band can be equipped in the $(marked)Aglet$()$(o) trinket slot$().
